subject: AI & Agents
title: AI in Education: Tutor for Everyone
description: One-minute skill: AI in Education: Tutor for Everyone.

hook.text: A student in rural Kenya gets the same quality AI tutor as a student at Harvard. For free.

buildup.text: AI tutors adapt to each student's pace, style, and knowledge gaps in real time.

discovery.text: Studies show AI tutoring can improve student performance by the equivalent of moving from 50th to 98th percentile.

twist.text: But AI tutors can also do homework for students, undermining the learning they're supposed to enable.

climax.text: The challenge isn't the technology â€” it's designing education systems that use AI to enhance, not replace, learning.

punchline.text: The best tutor is patient, available, and personalized. AI checks every box.

quiz.question: What is a major risk of AI tutors in education?
options: Students may use them to bypass learning rather than enhance it
They are always less effective than human tutors
AI tutors only work in wealthy countries
